response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to our dedication to excellence. Given its unique features and the craftsmanship involved, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. Considering its worth, I am extending an exclusive offer to you for $15,000. This price reflects the investment we've made into creating something truly special. I trust you'll find this offer compelling and look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 15000}
